name: RE: WIND
description:
RE:WIND

Created for the Brackey's 2020.2 game jam under the theme "REWIND", this experience allows you to enter a serene forest and use your breath to push leaves from one platform to the next.

Requirements:

  • VR-Ready PC and Oculus Rift Headset
    • OR
  • Oculus Quest

Using SteamVR will trigger a height-bug where you are extremely tall in the world. Will update this page once it's fixed!

Oculus Quest Version Is Here! Download the "Quest - RE: WIND" folder and use this guide as a reference: https://uploadvr.com/sideloading-quest-how-to/

Controls:

Breathe into the microphone of your headset to create wind currents. Create currents to move the leaf in each level from one platform to the next.
